```{r}

data(iris)

data <- iris %>% 
    mutate(sepal = Sepal.Length, 
           petal = Petal.Length, 
           species = Species) %>% 
    select(sepal, petal, species) %>% 
    filter(species %in% c("setosa", "versicolor"))

data %>% 
    ggplot(aes( x = sepal, y = petal)) + 
        geom_point(aes(color = species)) + 
        xlab("sepal length") + 
        ylab("petal length") + 
        ggtitle("Species vs sepal and petal lengths")

```

```{r}

data <- data %>% 
    mutate(target = ifelse(species == 'setosa', 1, -1))

data

```


```{r}

w <- c(w1 = 0, w2 = 0, b = 0)
w

```

```{r}

dt.misclass <- data %>% 
    mutate(yhat = sign(w[1] * sepal + w[2] * petal + w[3] * 1), 
           loss = target * yhat) %>% 
    summarise(misclass = which(loss <= 0 )) %>% 
    pull(misclass)


if (length(dt.misclass) > 0){
    id <- dt.misclass[1]
    # id <- sample(dt.misclass, 1)
} else {
    id <- NA
}

x <- c(simplify2array(data %>% select(sepal, petal) %>% slice(id)), 1)
y <- simplify2array(data %>% select(target) %>% slice(id))

dw <- y * x
w <- w + dw

data %>% 
    ggplot(aes( x = sepal, y = petal)) + 
        geom_point(aes(color = species)) + 
        geom_point(data = data %>% slice(id), 
                   aes(x = sepal, y = petal), 
                   size = 2, shape = 18) + 
        geom_abline(slope = -w[1]/w[2], intercept = -w[3]/w[2], color = 'black') + 
        xlab("sepal length") + 
        ylab("petal length") + 
        # ylim(0, 10) + xlim(0, 10) + 
        ggtitle("Species vs sepal and petal lengths")


```



```{r}

w <- c(w1 = 0, w2 = 0, b = 0)
W_history <- w
P_history <- c(NULL)

for (iter in seq(100)){
    dt.misclass <- data %>% 
        mutate(yhat = sign(w[1] * sepal + w[2] * petal + w[3]), 
               loss = target * yhat) %>% 
        summarise(misclass = which(loss <= 0 )) %>% 
        pull(misclass)
    
    
    if (length(dt.misclass) > 0){
        id <- dt.misclass[1]
        # id <- sample(dt.misclass, 1)
        P_history  <- cbind(P_history, id)
    } else {
        break
    }
    
    x <- c(simplify2array(data %>% select(sepal, petal) %>% slice(id)), 1)
    y <- simplify2array(data %>% select(target) %>% slice(id))
    
    dw <- y * x
    w <- w + dw
    W_history <- bind_rows(W_history, w)
}

W_history
```
